thread.title: Acid burn victim gets relief thanks to surgery
thread.title_full: Acid burn victim gets relief thanks to surgery | News24

author: news24.com
title: Acid burn victim gets relief thanks to surgery
text:
Johannesburg â€“ Since her former boyfriend threw acid over her nearly a year ago, Ines Antonio can hardly sleep at night because of the pain.
She struggles to get up, to shower and dress herself. Even chewing is painful. The severe chemical burns caused the skin under both arms, on her neck and lower lip to contract, reducing and making any movement painful.
"I am awake for most of the night because of the pain. This has become my life," Antonio was Quote: d as saying in a statement.
On Tuesday, she underwent the first of two operations at Netcare Linksfield Hospital to help restore some of her movement.
